item.description:
Dear Members,

How are you?
Please take a little moment to read this message, Thank you

This is a great book and I really like it. I am think about to start a book discussion group.

Here is some information about this book
http://en.wikipedia.o...

Here is an information about Hui-Neng:
http://en.wikipedia.o...

Here is the book:
Please check it out! Thank you for your time
http://www.katinkahes...

I am think about to start this book discussion on the Feb 26 (Thursday) at 7:00-8:30pm in Westborough Public Library.

Here is the location:
55 West Main Street
Westborough, MA 01581

Topic: introduction about this book

Thank you for your time to read this message, If this is not a good time for you, I am sorry. You are still welcome to join our regular meetup

Take care
Jonathan

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: You can ask the staff about "meeting room" in the libaray
item.name: additional book discussion
